title: OJS Queue Statistics
description: Detailed statistics for an OJS queue, including job counts by state, throughput metrics, and timing information.

queue.title: Queue Name
queue.description: The name of the queue these statistics apply to.

status.title: Queue Status
status.description: Current operational status of the queue.

stats.title: Statistics
stats.description: Detailed statistical counters and metrics for the queue.

available.title: Available Jobs
available.description: Number of jobs in the 'available' state, ready for pickup.

active.title: Active Jobs
active.description: Number of jobs currently being executed by workers.

scheduled.title: Scheduled Jobs
scheduled.description: Number of jobs waiting for their scheduled execution time.

retryable.title: Retryable Jobs
retryable.description: Number of jobs waiting to be retried after a failure.

discarded.title: Discarded Jobs
discarded.description: Number of jobs that have been permanently discarded (dead letter).

completed_last_hour.title: Completed Last Hour
completed_last_hour.description: Number of jobs successfully completed in the last hour.

failed_last_hour.title: Failed Last Hour
failed_last_hour.description: Number of jobs that failed in the last hour.

avg_duration_ms.title: Average Duration (ms)
avg_duration_ms.description: Average job execution duration in milliseconds.

avg_wait_ms.title: Average Wait Time (ms)
avg_wait_ms.description: Average time jobs spend waiting in queue before being claimed, in milliseconds.

throughput_per_second.title: Throughput Per Second
throughput_per_second.description: Current throughput measured in jobs completed per second.

computed_at.title: Computed At
computed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when these statistics were computed.
